name: DungeonDark
description:
Whispers of a greate treasure, hidden on the deppts of an ancient dungeon. "Will you be the one to reach it's end and clain the fortune for yourself?"

DungeonDark is a deungeon crawling game, where you explore a series of rooms, collect keys, defeat enemies and try to reach the end.

The game was made for a college project.

Made with Godot.
